text: وما ينۢبغى للرحمن ان يتخذ ولدا

translations.translation: It is not fitting for the All-Merciful to have a son.
When it does not behove the Merciful to have a son.
It does not befit the Most Compassionate Lord that He should take a son.
The Beneficent God is too Exalted to have a son.
And it does not befit the Most Gracious to choose an offspring!
But it is not suitable for the Most Gracious that He should beget a son.
And it is not worthy of the Beneficent Allah that He should take (to Himself) a son.
and it behoves not the All-merciful to take a son.
When it is not meet for (the Majesty of) the Beneficent that He should choose a son.
It does not become the majesty of the Compassionate God to take to Himself a son:
And it behoveth not the Compassionate that he should take a son. *Chapter: 19
It does not behoove the All-beneficent to take a son.
For it is not consonant with the majesty of (Allah) Most Gracious that He should beget a son.
But it is not suitable for (the Majesty of) the Most Beneficent (Allah) that He should beget a son (or offspring or children).
It is not for the Merciful to take a son!
It is not fitting for the Most Merciful to have a son.
And it is not appropriate for the Most Merciful that He should take a son.
[19:92] when it is not meet for [the Majesty of] the Compassionate One to take a son, that is to say, such a thing does not befit Him.
(When it is not meet for (the Majesty of) the Beneficent that He should choose a son) It does not befit him to take Ezra as a son.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
ولا يشغله شأن عن شأن { أَن يَتَّخِذَ } زوجةً ويتسبب بها ليظهر { وَلَداً } [مريم: 92] يستخلفه ويستظهر به ويستعين منه
 تعالى عما يقول الظالمون علواً كبيراً


بل { إِن كُلُّ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ } من الملائكة المهيمين المستغرقين بمطالعة جمال الله
 المستوحشين من سطوة جلاله { وَٱلأَرْضِ } أي: مَن في عالم الطبيعة المتوجهة نحو مبدعها طوعاً { إِلاَّ آتِي ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ } المهّدِ الممد لهم أضلال أسمائه الحسنى وأوصافه العظمى
 والمفيضِ عليهم من رشحات بحر وجوده
